title: Their Biker Babe in Training
description: [Siren Ménage Everlasting: Erotic Ménage a Trois Romance, M/F/M, public exhibition, spanking, HEA]Alexis is heading for a breakdown. She’s been burning the candle in the middle and at both ends. She takes a month off to learn how to relax but breaks down on the way. Neal and Mark stop to help her. They talk her into letting them teach her all she needs to know about how to relax. Will she prove to be a fast learner, or is she beyond hope? Alexis is determined to give it her best shot.Neal and Mark recognize their perfect woman in Alexis, if she just weren’t so uptight. They make it their business to show her the art of taking it easy and show her how to be a biker babe all at the same time. They hope to convince her to stick around. When her month is up, will she stay with them or go back to the daily grind?
author: Marla Monroe
